response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This product holds immense value to us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value and ensures that both parties benefit from this transaction. Please let us know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
